item.title: Need help making pvpvalues [317 delta]
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

You haven’t made it so it identifies the player has 100m yet.

public void pvpvalue() { for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1)); if(value > 100000000 && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomwaffle(), absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false); } else // if player has 100m, ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomwaffle2(), absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false); } }

[code]

i worked on creating a new code such as this:

public void pvpvalue()
{
for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++)
{
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1));
if(value > 100000000 && playerItems[i]-1 != -1)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomwaffle(), absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
}
